item.title: Escape Game in VR
item.description:
Discover our virtual reality (VR) escape game, crafted by Mélanie Brégou and Pauline Spinga. Inspired by fantastic universes and Unity Store’s Escape Room assets, we have developed original enigmas: from recreating melodies to assembling puzzles, all to unravel clues for escaping our magical-themed house.
